text: Pork belly is a boneless and fatty cut of pork. The pork belly futures contract became an icon of futures and commodities trading. Pork belly is usually crispy on the outside and juicy inside. == Regional dishes == === Korea === In Korea, pork belly with the skin removed is known as samgyeopsal (삼겹살). === Philippines === In the Philippines, pork belly is very popular. Lechon kawali is a pork belly that is seasoned, deep-fried, and served by being chopped into pieces. === United States === In the United States, bacon is most often made from pork bellies. == Health benefits == Pork belly is a good source of protein, which is essential for various bodily functions.
